conbody.p: In the Save dialog box, there are the following requirements for the input of characters in text boxes.

li.p: Any character other than left angle bracket "<", right angle bracket ">", separation sign "|", asterisks "*", left sptrip"/", right "\", English colon ":" and English interrogation mark "?". Inputting these characters will open the prompt message as follows:
64 characters can be input at most. Exceeding this range will open the prompt mes-sage as follows:
Blank input is allowed. And the series description will be saved as blank.
